content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
No, we did not agree on a final price. The potential tenant insisted on 550 euros per month, but I was willing to go down to 575 euros per month, but not below. The price difference was too significant for me to continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
I would not rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, as that was not the focus of our conversation. The focus was on the rental price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point of the negotiation. The focus of our conversation was on the rental price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt
